item.title: Book Riot’s Deals of the Day for November 11, 2025
item.description: (Mostly) true notes on gossip, forbidden magic in an ancient war, a reimagined goddess of the underworld, and more of today's best book deals

item.title: The Risky Book That Just Won the Booker
item.description: David Szalay's Flesh takes home the prize, the Goodreads Choice Awards begin, and we revisit the OG of dark academia.

item.title: Voting has Begun for the 2025 Goodreads Choice Awards
item.description: The opening round of the 2025 Goodreads Choice Awards has begun! Cast your vote for your favorite reads of the year.

item.title: Big Audiobook Dynamite: Three Great SFF Listens
item.description: Put these great sci-fi and fantasy audiobooks in your ears! There are knights, court politics, UFO landings, and more to discover.

item.title: What to Gift the Queer Reader On Your List
item.description: From bookmarks and stickers to a show-stopping pendant, these gifts are perfect the queer reader on your list—or for treating yourself with.
